bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Looks like the info doc is missing from screen-4.5.1-1.fc24.x86_64. 'info screen' only gives the man page.
I found this: https://bugs.archlinux.org/task/53139
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 4.5.1-1.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1.just intall the version 4.5.1-1.fc24.x86_64. 2. 3.
Actual results: info screen only show the man page
Expected results: info screen show the info doc of screen
Additional info:
screen-4.5.1-2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-8c6caaf851
screen-4.5.1-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-a41e73423b
screen-4.5.1-2.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-114a8b0635

screen-4.5.1-2.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-114a8b0635
